title: Sur Ta Rue
overview: Sur Ta Rue is an investigative documentary series in which private detective Annie Richard leads celebrities into the troubling past of their neighborhood. In each episode, she reveals to her guest the story of a place that is unique to her: her residence, her childhood home, or even her secondary school. She then takes to the road with the guest artist to reveal to him what his street has known in terms of crimes, accidents, legends, paranormal activities and heroic gestures. Together, they meet the witnesses of these events, bringing to light forgotten parts of our collective history.
